modName: Alarynn Cruah - High Elf Companion ADULT
descriptionHtml:
ALARYNN CRUACH – High Elf  Mage Follower (ADULT!)

Vs2.0

They said that the authorities of Thalmor search for any battle mage who deserted from Thalmor army and disappears somewhere in Skyrim. 
For a head of this traitor the big award is declared. 
However another rumor is spoken - this unknown elf has refused to kill Nords, therefore has been sentenced to death. 
People of Riverwood say, they saw, how some bandits dragged an elven woman towards Embershard mine. 
If you manage to rescue the poor creature from paws of bastards, you receive a good companion, on whom it is possible to rely on in any  situation

Alarynn Cruah – High Elf Companion for Dovakin
She is a battle mage (Destruction and Conjuration)
Thalmor Magic Combat Style
Essential
Marriable
Calculated Lvls from 5 to 65
Initial Armor: No armor or outfit. 
Initial Weapon: Iron Dagger

Location: Embershard Mine near Riverwood

Version 2.0

Now Alarynn doesn`t attack everybody when you dismiss her
She will be waiting for you in the place you have left her
Also I changed her appearance to make her more \"elfish\"


--------------------
Installation
--------------------
Just drop all content from archive downloaded to your Skyrim Daya folder.
Activate SNAlarynn.esp and play



-------------------
How to uninstall
-------------------
Just delete the esp.file from the Data folder


------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST  INSTALL APACHI SKYHAIR V1.4

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
or CBBE http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits to the modders whose mods are mentioned above!



------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, reuse or reupload just give me credit.
Thank  Bethesda for a  great game


-------------------
Bugs
-------------------
Not detected so far

After dismissing Alarynn will wait you in the place you have left her or come back to Embershard Mine and be nude again. It is strange but I have no idea to change her home location at the moment. 
Also Alarynn can \"kill\" bandits when you enter the mine. So you may help her to finish them all))





Have fun!
author: Sandraniks
